section.section: An employer receiving assistance under the Program shall be located in the State.

In order to receive assistance under the Program, an employer shall request training assistance in job-specific skills to upgrade or retain existing Maryland-based employees covered under Title 8 of the Labor and Employment Article.

text.section:
The Secretary shall give priority to employers that are:
manufacturers; or
threatened by the pressure of increased foreign or domestic competition.
